verses.roman:
śivānandera bhāgya-sindhu ke pāibe pāra?
yāṅra saba goṣṭhīke prabhu kahe 'āpanāra'

synonyms: śivānandera—of Śivānanda Sena; bhāgya-sindhu—the ocean of fortune; ke—who; pāibe pāra—can cross over; yāṅra—whose; saba goṣṭhīke—whole family; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kahe—says; āpanāra—His own.
translation: No one can cross over the ocean of Śivānanda Sena's good fortune, for the Lord considered Śivānanda's whole family His own.
